title: Bard HYPE
body: Finally an interesting champion, cant wait to play him..

replies.body: His portal thing looks awesome. Can't wait to buy his bundle when he comes out.
I bet every1 hates him when he's released...
I just know I'm going to buy the champ/skin bundle. I don't want to but I know it's going to happen... Dam Riot and their new champs...

I can already see it...

"fuk you support you suck"

*team getting chased by enemy*
*Ult own team so enemy can catch up*

"fuk you guys"

LOL
that e and ult look amazing. he's one of the most unique champs, in both visuals and gameplay.
